patthana8.70:4.1: Napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.70:5.1: Naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.70:6.1: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.70:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
